title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label height should adjust accordingly.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Navigate to the label settings.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height does not change.
